member.name: T:HADotNet.Core.Clients.CalendarClient
member.summary: Provides access to the calendar API for retrieving information about calendar entries.

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.CalendarClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the .
member.param: The preconfigured to communicate with a Home Assistant instance.

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.CalendarClient.GetEvents(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of current and future calendar items, from now until the specified . The maximum number of results is driven by the "max_results" configuration option in the calendar config.
member.param: The full name of the calendar entity. If this paramter does not start with "calendar.", it will be prepended automatically.
Optional, defaults to 30. The number of days from the current point in time to retrieve calendar items for.
member.returns: A representing the calendar items found.

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.CalendarClient.GetEvents(System.String,System.DateTimeOffset,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of current and future calendar items, between the and parameters. The maximum number of results is driven by the "max_results" configuration option in the calendar config.
member.param: The full name of the calendar entity. If this paramter does not start with "calendar.", it will be prepended automatically.
The start date/time to search.
The end date/time to search.
member.returns: A representing the calendar items found.

member.summary: Retrieves the most recently available (still) image data from the specified .
member.param: The camera entity ID to reteive the image for.
true to include the prefix "data:image/jpg;base64,", false to omit. Defaults to true.
member.returns: A web-friendly Base64-encoded still image, in JPEG format.

member.name: T:HADotNet.Core.Clients.HistoryClient
member.summary: Provides access to the history API for retrieving and querying for historical state information.

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.HistoryClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the .
member.param: The preconfigured to communicate with a Home Assistant instance.

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.HistoryClient.GetHistory
member.summary: Retrieves a list of ALL historical states for all entities for the past 1 day. WARNING: On larger HA installs, this can return 300+ entities, over 4 MB of data, and take 20+ seconds.
member.returns: A representing a 24-hour history snapshot for all entities.

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.HistoryClient.GetHistory(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of ALL historical states for all entities for the specified day ( + 24 hours). WARNING: On larger HA installs, this can return 300+ entities, over 4 MB of data, and take 20+ seconds.
member.returns: A representing a 24-hour history snapshot starting from for all entities.

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.HistoryClient.GetHistory(System.DateTimeOffset,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of ALL historical states for all entities for the specified time range, from to . WARNING: On larger HA installs, for multiple days, this can return A LOT of data and potentially take a LONG time to return. Use with caution!
member.returns: A representing a 24-hour history snapshot, from to , for all entities.

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.HistoryClient.GetHistory(System.DateTimeOffset,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of ALL historical states for all entities for the specified time range, from , for the specified . WARNING: On larger HA installs, for multiple days, this can return A LOT of data and potentially take a LONG time to return. Use with caution!
member.returns: A representing a 24-hour history snapshot, from , for the specified , for all entities.

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.HistoryClient.GetHistory(System.String,System.DateTimeOffset,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of historical states for the specified for the specified time range, from to .
member.param: The entity ID to filter on.
The earliest history entry to retrieve.
The most recent history entry to retrieve.
member.returns: A of history snapshots for the specified , from to .

member.name: M:HADotNet.Core.Clients.HistoryClient.GetHistory(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of historical states for the specified for the past 1 day.
member.param: The entity ID to retrieve state history for.
member.returns: A representing a 24-hour history snapshot for the specified .
